body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Exemplar Cars. My name is Johnny Jones. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Shirley Clark.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Shirley. Can you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two five zero four, two zero zero three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. One final piece of information I need is your postal code. Can you share that with me, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's L four two w x.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Shirley, for providing those details. We will look into the pricing issue right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you. I hope it gets resolved soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Your concern matters to us, Shirley. Thank you for your time. Have a great day!
